title: Enhance Agent Status Visibility in Admin Dashboard
description: Redesign agent status cards with prominent color-coded status indicators to improve at-a-glance visibility of agent activity levels
acceptance_criteria: Agent cards have prominent color-coded status indicators
Status colors follow semantic convention (green=working/active, gray=idle, red=blocked, yellow=focused)
Status is visible at-a-glance without reading text
Design is accessible (color blind friendly with icons/patterns)
Animation or visual feedback for status changes
Responsive design works on mobile and desktop
Dark Mystique theme maintained with new colors

visual_elements.secondary_indicator: Status badge with icon in top-right corner
visual_elements.tertiary_indicator: Subtle background glow matching status color

accessibility.screen_reader: Status announced via semantic HTML labels

technical_notes.performance_requirements: Status updates should be reflected within 500ms, no jank during animations

metadata.user_story: As a project manager, I want to see agent status at-a-glance with color coding, so I can quickly identify which agents are working, idle, or blocked without reading detailed text.
